title: *Urgent* First Blood Esports are looking for a university students for the ESL Uni league
body:
We are currently looking for players (ADC/JG/MID) to join First Blood Esports. You will be rostered as a sub however if you make it to more practice sessions than the players who are already rostered then you will replace them. You rank does not really matter to us because we just want to have a bit of fun.

We are participating in the ESL Uni League and there is a cup on the 12th of March. If you are available for a next few days and free Sunday morning (8am AEST - ) and would like to play please leave your role/username and either our captian (Austrike) or myself will get back to you.
